QuestData.Title: Search the Bole
QuestData.Description: I wish your tidings were better.$B$BRaene is correct, I know about Dartol's creation and the treants in the area--at least I did once. They've become corrupted now, their nature twisted.$B$BTo find the next piece of the rod, you'll have to find the key to open the chest it's in.$B$BThe wooden key is on one of the treants northeast of here near the Felwood border, at the Howling Vale. Once you have it, look for a small glade through the tunnel at the vale. The chest should be hidden around there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Wooden Key and use it to obtain the Iron Shaft portion of Dartol's Rod.
QuestData.CompletionText: It upsets me so that the treants have become corrupt. I wish I could do more to help them.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm pleased to see you're back, $n.
